name: dualores
title: Dual Ores
author: roanoke314
description: Vanilla friendly mod that adds 6 supplemental ores to the game. Each of the new ores can be processed into one of two of the other raw vanila resources. Inspired by Leighzer's Morphite.  This takes a middle ground as the opertunity costs for each dual ore are a binary decision of: Do I need more of ore X or Y
